channel.title: AddyScape!
channel.description:
Hey guys im making a new server called AddyScape, its gonna be a lot like runescape but different in the way that its going to be for stronger people that can handle pking, (like most of the world will be PK zones...)
Im actually kind of new to this whole making a server thing so whoever i recruit to the team will need to answer a few of my questions...
My role will be Management, web designing, forum making, and some coding (even tho im not that good)
I have already started working on a website (link wont be realeased until i get it approved by an admin or moderator) but i do have some pics...
[IMG]http://i972.photobucket.com/albums/ae208/gtasafan/rsps1.jpg[/img]
Roles: 1. [s]server coder x2 (also needs to be able to make a server from a base...)[/s] [b]TAKEN[/b]
2. Client coder x2
3. Assistant Manager (web designing, event organising forum managing etc)
The application: 1. Age 2. Role: 3. Experience: 4. How much time do you plan to devote to this: 5. Why are you applying for the role you chose:
Please join and be happy!
PS: Once we are ready our server will go into 24/7 online play, and I can advertise it through websites, youtube, etc... AND I have loads of experience in moding, if you know what that is (you know grand theft auto san andreas) yea, i made several cars for that... I was known as Livegta, but i dont do that anymore...

item.title: AddyScape!
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

The application:

  1. Age: 19
  2. Role: Ill take any role offered
  3. Experience: I have been coding Java and C++ For over 2 years. Im A pro with websites, Forums, Photoshop, Gimp and other photo editing softwares. I have run over 15 different servers. I can also Create clients from scratch, Or re do a previously made client.
  4. How much time do you plan to devote to this: I can devote about 4-5 hours a day.
  5. Why are you applying for the role you chose: I’m Applying because atm im not running a server and im bored so hoping to get accepted onto here

As far as websites go here are some examples of what i have done if you would like to check them out,
www.trinity-pkz.at.ua
www.trinity-pvp.at.ua
http://Decimation-x.webs.com

If i am accepted either add my msn Jonathanhubel28@msn.com, Or leave me a pm on here thanks.

Read full topic
